section.title: SensePairRelation relation type
section.para: Represents an undirected pair of two senses (typically - but not necessarily - belonging to two different entries). Recommended for representing pairs of antonyms, opposites, converses and so on.

listitem.para: Can be constrained and mapped to external authorities by the DMLex Controlled Vocabularies Module.
Sense (exactly two, both in the same LexicographicResource)
